channel.title: Update on Naomi News
channel.description: Recent content in Update on Naomi News

item.title: Map plots show base map
item.description: The input and output choropleth plots will now show a base map behind the country plots. You will be able to see more context for your country including water bodies. You can click the button “Show base map” to toggle the map background on or off.

item.title: Input time series now shows missing data
item.description: We’ve made an update to the input time series to more clearly show missing input data. The input time series is used to display time trends of input programme data, the plots show the raw data and aggregates at admin levels. If the input data has a missing value for a region we now display this as a greyed out circle. When an aggregate contains a region with a missing value previously that was shown as 0.

item.title: Vue3 upgrade
item.description: We’ve updated the front end framework we use for building Naomi. Naomi used to be built on Vue2 which is reaching end of life. This has been upgraded to the new Vue3. You should see no major changes to the UI, let us know if you encounter any problems.

item.title: All model fit and calibration options will now be set by default
item.description: All model fit and calibration options now have default values. The defaults are the options used in the final naomi fit from last years estimates process. Note that if the value of any of the options used last year is no longer a valid option (for example if the prevalence survey selected last year is not uploaded this year) then we attempt to set a default from information in the input data.
